section.p:
This topic provides information specific to managing replicated and preloaded data regions.
To create a replicated region, use one of the REPLICATE com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.RegionShortcut> settings. To create a preloaded region, set your region data-policy to preloaded. This cache.xml declaration creates a replicated region: <region-attributes refid="REPLICATE"> </region-attributes>
